UI/UX Design & Front-End Development

HTML - CSS - JavaScript - Responsive Design

SAMPSA SAARI

UI/UX Designer & Front-End Developer | Oulu, Finland

I am Front-End Developer with good eye on design. I enjoy creating simple, beatiful and intuitive user interfaces. I love to bring my designs to life in HTML, CSS & JavaScript.

I have created my first Website at age of 10, when I got my first computer. Since then I have created multiple sites using HTML & CSS. Now I'm learning to master JavaScript also.

I have graduated from Oulu University of Applied Sciences, with Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) degree. Now I'm working with my Master's Degree in Oulu University, and looking for new job opportunities. Visit my LinkedIn page to learn more about my experience and skills, or contact me by e-mail.

When I'm not working with Design & Development, I'm spending time with my family, lifting weights at gym or taking photographs of our beautiful nature. You can view my photographs from Flickr or 500px.

WHAT I DO

  • Front-End Development

    I create pixel perfect responsive websites. I use technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (jQuery). I have experience from different Front-End frameworks like Bootstrap and Foundation. I have also experience from WordPress theme development. I write semantic markup to keep the codebase maintanable. My Front-End build process involes use of SASS, Gulp, Bower and NPM to speed up the development. I am learning new technologies like Angular and React to improve my skills as a Developer.

  • UX/UI Design

    I am mix of developer and designer. I have good visual eye to create beutiful things. My goal is to create beautiful interfaces that are easy to use. I am very experienced with Adobe Photoshop, and able to design beautiful sites and content. I am currently learning new tools like Sketch to improve my skills as a Designer.

  • Usability Testing

    I am interested in good usability. During my University studies i have attended to Usability testing course, where we made usability test for our client's product. I have experience from definition of test scenarios and tasks, design of pre and post interviews, and moderation of usability tests.

PORTFOLIO

iOS Style Calculator

My personal homepage which was recreated to showcase my Web development skills and projects that I have done. Recreation was also learning process to learn new technologies like Gulp, Bourbon and Neat.
